00073     explicit CowPtr(T* p = 0) throw()            : myPtr(p) {}
00074     // no need for ~CowPtr - the CountedPtr takes care of everything.
00075     CowPtr(const CowPtr& r) throw()             : myPtr(r.myPtr) {}
00079     CowPtr(const CountedPtr<T> & r)    : myPtr( r ) {}
00080     CowPtr& operator=(const CowPtr& r)
00081     {
00082         if (this != &r)
00083             myPtr = r.myPtr;
00084         return *this;
00085     }

00091

00093     T* operator->()                         {copy(); return myPtr.get();}
00094     T* get()                                {copy(); return myPtr.get();}

00110     void copy()                            // create a new copy of myPtr
00111     {
00112         if (!myPtr.unique()) {
00113             T* old_p = myPtr.get();
00114             myPtr = CountedPtr<T>(new T(*old_p));
00115         }
